The description with regard to specific ethical issues will depend on the committee to which the annual report is addressed and will reflect progress in the reporting year.

  • For the CEI, progress and issues arising with regard to risk/benefit aspects, information and consent, confidentiality, etc.
  • For the CEEA, progress and issues arising with regard to replacement, refinement and reduction.
  • For CBE, progress and issues arising from the prevention of health or environmental risks related to biological agents or genetically modified organisms under research.
Briefly describe how the ethical aspects of the project are progressing and point out any issues encountered and solutions, if any.
